item.title: ASP.NET Helpers by Offering Solutions
item.description: I released a new version of the ASP.NET Helpers by Offering Solutions: Nuget: AspNetHelpers by Offering Solutions which includes ViewModelBase SubmitModelBase ModelValidator (for easier validation) and features like Nullcheck with Exception Nullcheck with returning the type if not null, otherwise exception Return bool value if something is null Checking enumerable if its null or empty Checks if a string is a timespan Checks if a string is an email Converts a string to datetime Converts a string to timespan Checks a string for null, empty or a given length (e.
